IF EXISTS (SELECT * FROM dbo.sysobjects WHERE id = object_id(N'dbo.get_buddies') AND OBJECTPROPERTY(id, N'IsProcedure') = 1) DROP PROCEDURE dbo.get_buddies GO
CREATE PROCEDURE dbo.get_buddies @charater_id dbo.id_t AS
SET NOCOUNT ON
SELECT c.account_id, c.id, c.nickname FROM dbo.Buddy_Infos AS b INNER JOIN Characters AS c ON b.buddy_2_id = c.id WHERE b.buddy_1_id = @charater_id
SELECT c.account_id, c.id, c.nickname FROM dbo.Buddy_Infos AS b INNER JOIN Characters AS c ON b.buddy_1_id = c.id WHERE b.buddy_2_id = @charater_id
SELECT c.account_id, c.id, c.nickname FROM dbo.Character_Blocks AS b INNER JOIN Characters AS c ON b.character_id = c.id WHERE b.owner_id = @charater_id
SET NOCOUNT OFF
